post_message: Breaking News: Gov. Nikki Haley of South Carolina called for removal of a Confederate battle flag from the State Capitol grounds after the white man accused of killing 9 black people was seen brandishing that flag in widely circulated pictures. “It’s time to move the flag from the Capitol grounds,” the governor said.
